import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5000/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Étudiants
export const getStudents=()=>api.get('/students');export const getStudent=id=>api.get("/students/".concat(id));export const createStudent=data=>api.post('/students',data);export const updateStudent=(id,data)=>api.put("/students/".concat(id),data);export const deleteStudent=id=>api.delete("/students/".concat(id));// Cours
export const getCourses=()=>api.get('/courses');export const getCourse=id=>api.get("/courses/".concat(id));export const createCourse=data=>api.post('/courses',data);export const updateCourse=(id,data)=>api.put("/courses/".concat(id),data);export const deleteCourse=id=>api.delete("/courses/".concat(id));// Inscriptions
export const getEnrollments=()=>api.get('/enrollments');export const createEnrollment=data=>api.post('/enrollments',data);export const updateEnrollment=(id,data)=>api.put("/enrollments/".concat(id),data);export const deleteEnrollment=id=>api.delete("/enrollments/".concat(id));export default api;
